post.text: I rarely agree with President Obama- however he is 100% correct about Crooked Hillary Clinton. Great ad!

replies.author: Abigail
replies.text: She just as dumb as her husband though man. All that talking about change. When in reality all they've done is skyrocket health insurance premiums and only made it "affordable" to the people who already don't pay and are given health insurance through the government. How is that positive change?

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Bro ain't no way you can talk down about Michelle or Barack because don't forget what state the country was in under the Bush Administration Obama got us us out the grave and now people forgot unemployment rate up all the stocks up teen pregnancy down the economy is nowhere near the position that it was in eight years ago you can say is he made health care Affordable fur ppl who couldn't afford it u sound sound like you are regurgitating information you heard

replies.author: Abigail
replies.text: Tyler I sound like I'm regurgitating something I heard? Na I say that with personal experience. Health care isn't affordable. Not for me. I can pay the premium but the co-pays are ridiculously high. Tylerhat's cold hard facts pimp
